entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #81057
  • System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream no-op's writing 0 bytes #81053
  • Random jit stress failures in JIT\Directed\arglist\vararg #81049
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'dest->TypeGet() == src->TypeGet()' in 'Vector2_3_4Test:RunVector2Tests()' during 'Morph - Global' (IL size 348; hash 0xcf5ce7a3; FullOpts) #81048
    8.0.0
  • Erroneous `IOException` in `TarWriter.WriteEntry` on MacOS #81047
    8.0.0
  • Add DeflateStream remark indicating we don't guarantee same results between releases #81043
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort 7 no longer throws TimeoutException but System.IO.IOException with message mentioning timeout #81035
  • .NET 8 dotnet/runtime Testing for Debian 12 (Bookworm) #81034
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SegmentTree<T> collection #81032
  • XmlSerializer does not deserialize to DateOnly #81030
  • [wasm][debugger] Move Shift-Alt-D functionality from aspnetcore repo to runtime repo #81028
    8.0.0
  • Exception when Deserializing Nullable<double> #81025
  • Enable building NativeAOT for iOS platforms #81024
    8.0.0
  • TaskCancelledException in HttpConnectionPool #81023
  • [.NET6 fix port] NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException #81022
    Future
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision based on ref counts and liveness interact in incorrect ways #81019
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_rootNode->OperIsLocal() && !m_rootNode->OperIsLocalAddr()' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #81018
    8.0.0
  • INumber<T>.Create(out bool successful), [area-System.Numerics] #81016
  • Application crash - access violation in coreclr!SVR::gc_heap::mark_object_simple1 #81015
  • Valgrind reports Native AOT shared library memory leaks #81008
  • Exception not being thrown when null value encountered for non-nullable type #81007

Closed

  • PipeReader ReadAsync Do not cover all the case of completion of stream #80039
  • Binding a dictionary mutates existing values instead of replacing #79770
    8.0.0
  • ArrayTypeMismatchException in nested arrays with function pointers (android) #80095
    7.0.x
  • dotnet-counters: Missing System.Runtime-Counters when publishing a trimmed app #79648
    8.0.0
  • Add regex source generator tests that compare against known output #63300
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add timeout data to CancellationToken to retrieve the cancellation timeout passed to CTS.CancelAfter #81045
  • [Proposal]: Add ZZZ date/time format specifier #81040
    Future
  • .net core 3.1 DeflateStream is incompatible with .net framework 4.8 DeflateStream #58038
    Future
  • How to manage connections towards Apache when MaxKeepAliveRequests is not infinite? #79610
  • Make big endian, little endian chosable in BitConverter #80982
  • NetworkChange NetworkAddressChanged event throws NetworkInformationException on Android #77822
    8.0.0
  • API Proposal: Add BigEndian APIs to BinaryWriter and BinaryReader #77736
    Future
  • Http/SSl StressTest build failures #80706
    8.0.0
  • Distributed Transaction .Net 7 - Lost process #80776
  • Add Complete and TryComplete methods to the System.Threading.Channels.ChannelReader #26235
    Future
  • System.Threading.Channels: Peek all channel content #50634
    Future
  • Need ChannelReader.TryReadAll #54038
    Future
  • Why SemaphoreSlims are not as optimized as Channels? #77098
    Future
  • [Task/ValueTask] Perf regression on Net 5 vs NetCore 3.1 #46130
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] removed native RWLock #81058
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix publishing to Arcade when there are no merged tests in the set #81054
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Re-enable System.Threading.Tasks tests for desktop interp #81046
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/6.0] Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #81042
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Publish `UpDownCounter` and `ObservableUpDownCounter` Events for System.Diagnostics.Metrics #81041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Eliminate a bounds check in `NumberBuffer` #81039
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid losing messages for memory-mapped stress log #81038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] benchmark fix aggressive trimming #81037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add Statement::m_treeListEnd #81031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] arm64 neon opcodes #81026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Speed up frozen string dictionaries and sets by ~25-30% #81021
    area-System.Collections
  • [mono][interp] Remove dependence on svar/dvar when computing call offset #81017
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #81013
  • [DRAFT] Test -test parameter in CI #81012
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix handling of postponed messages in TargetCore #81011
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [webcil] Minor cleanups #81009
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80855
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add expected output tests for regex source generator #80937
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][aot] Free LLVM module after AOT. #81014
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable legacy interop measurements #81027
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Allow forwarding field accesses off of implicit byrefs #80852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Optimize static fields of gc types #80969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fixed array delete in debugger.cpp #79638
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate `ToArray` bounds checks #81001
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution

Updated

  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Add direct jit calls to jiterpreter #80968
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists before inlining #81000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecesary library selection checking #79577
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Create live publishing workflow #79775
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add SYSLIB* analyzers to global configs #80930
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Use newer ubuntu 20.04 images #80808
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #80996
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] perf - debugging #80796
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Android] Bump target SDK version in Android manifest #80923
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [mono] Build mono logging profiler on s390x #72049
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Android] Add option to skip generating apk for a specific project #80909
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize "new DateTime(<const args>)" via improvements in JIT VN #81005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.x
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #80967
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Uncover IlcGenerateMstatFile #80998
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Integrate the JS implementation for `dotnet_browser_entropy` #2179

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge PR 67238 - JIT: Refactor call argument representation #2177
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable shared generics #2176

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [GenAPI] missing `new` keyword on return types #30082
  • Visual Basic WPF .NET Framework 48 SDK style project fails to compile: assembly mscorlib not found #30075

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable PRs for all release builds and remove some CI #30083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to OSX 12 for 7.0.1xx #30081
    Area-Infrastructure
  • BlazorWasmSdk: Serve .webcil as application/octet-stream #30077
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Allow overriding ServerGarbageCollection in WebSdk #22420
    Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set
  • Generic operators support in C#. #813
    Likely Never

PullRequests

Created

  • Public roles WG notes for 2023-01-23 #6905
  • Update formatting of line directive expression #6903

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please add codefix for constructor exits with "null" non-nullable members #66523
  • Better error fix suggestions on For loops when use commas rather than semicolons #66522

PullRequests

Created

  • Add assert failure to fatal error helper #66524
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update Collection Literal Team #66521
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix handling of Regex classification when splitting to multiple lines #66508
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Option helpers for VS Mac #66479
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Test/implement some aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66499
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Set a non-fatal error handler that rethrows exceptions in tests #36565
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline diagnostics - fix multiple blank lines bug #66468
    Area-IDE
  • Implemented `Make field/property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net6.0 MS.CA and MS.CA.C# build and annotate for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #46222
  • Allow `NameClaimType`/`RoleClaimType` to be configured with the authentication configuration provider #46221
  • Unable to Build from Source #46219
  • Project option not working correctly for the `user-jwts` command #46218
  • Server-side Blazor: render loop and update stops responding #46217

Closed

  • @microsoft/signalr - HubConnection onclose event causing app crash on iOS devices. #44564
  • Array will allocate less and little faster when creating RequestDelegateFactoryOptions in CreateRDFOptions #46010
    8.0-preview2
  • API proposal: enable configuring connection timeouts in HubConnectionBuilder #44742
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM PWA -> offline mode is not loading any resources #46210
  • Consider moving Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #36035
    8.0-preview1
  • QuickGrid Filtering Not Refreshing Property #46187
  • Add chrome.identity support for WebAssembly auth #46203
  • Importing Framer website to Blazor is not successfull #46211
  • Custom RemoteAuthenticationHandler Exceptions #46212
  • Blazor User.Identity seems to be null #46102
  • Blazor Custom elements not working with .net 7 Blazor Server #46091
  • Blazor WASM deployed to Cloudfront on url downloads 70 dlls, but Cloudfront url only downloads 20 #46152

PullRequests

Created

  • Evaluate BoundProperties when inferring BindindSource #46228
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Implement RouteHandlerServices.Map and use in RequestDelegateGenerator #46180
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Added withServerTimeout and withKeepAliveInterval to HubConnectionBuilder for java client #46172
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `356fc30` to `ec25eea` #46214
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Move Kestrel shared source to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [blazor][wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #46132
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't depend on source-build job while it isn't running #46220
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Delete duplicate define #46202
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix route syntax highlighting parameter color #46208
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add limit to length of IdentityUser.PhoneNumber. #45892
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Changed docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com Issue: #44175 #46206
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46182
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions when getting an error in server to client streaming #46198
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    2.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    area-web-frameworks
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 MAUI CollectionView item's context menu is not invokable via a Narrator screen reader touch gesture #12865
  • .NET 7 MAUI CollectionView doesn't support the UIA Grid pattern #12864
  • Bitcode is deprecated when publishing app to appstore MAUI in 7.0.200-preview.22628.1 #12863
  • MAUI need Canvas layout like WPF or UWP #12862
  • MAUI Webview Process Lifecycle/Crash events #12860
  • Dotnet restore fails when ApplicationDisplayVersion has some values to configure Unit Test for MAUI #12859
  • Add more Media* permissions for Android #12857
  • [iOS] Stacktrace from crashes initiated from Button.Clicked and synchronous code lack relevant stacktrace information #12853
  • CarouselView on Windows totally broken #12850
    Backlog
  • Height of `<Entry>` cannot be changed on Windows #12831
  • Switch initial state is incorrect #12830
    Backlog
  • Implement or remove PreventGestureBubbling behavior inside Windows Gesture Manager #12828
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry height rendering is broken #11098
    Backlog
  • .NET 7 MAUI unable to change CollectionView's ItemsLayout.GridItemsLayout.Span while app's running #12866
  • Blazor UI Freezes entirely on .NET 7 #12262
  • Mouse gets ignored after writing into a contenteditable element (MAUI Blazor) #12589
  • Resolving an x:Reference in a RELEASE build picks the wrong element in some cases. #8149
  • Resizetizer error where appicon_background.png is in use by another process #12653
  • When copy pasting existing image to be a splash screen, unexpected behaviours occur #12676
  • Add Missing Extended Dynamic Range APIs to iOS #12852
  • Windows Share.RequestAsync is brain dead - please make it like Mac, Android and iOS #12822
    Backlog
  • Android - Soft Keyboard - AdjustPan - Page does not un-pan when keyboard is closed #12793
  • MAUI BlazorWebView is zoomed out on Mac #12829
  • Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException: 'Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views.' #12670
  • Triggering a change with the ContainerView results in incorrect things #12116
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Actions] Github actions do not support double quotes on expressions. #12871
    community ✨
  • Update HOWTOBUILD for MAUI #12869
  • Update Essentials Text-To-Speech API Docs #12851
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.8 to 1.2.1.9 #12848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12846
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12844
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.10 to 1.0.0.11 #12843
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1.1 to 1.6.0.1 #12841
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12840
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12839
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.15 to 1.0.0.16 #12838
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.10 to 1.1.0.11 #12837
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12836
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview

Merged

  • [Action] Fix manual trigger. #12870
    community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.1 to 1.3.1.2 #12835
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ef migrations bundle --output {PATH} fails if directory chain for PATH does not exist. #30123
  • .NET 7 regression: Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed etc." #30122
  • EF Core 7 In-Memory database provider throws while evaluating value conversions. #30121
  • ExecuteUpdateAsync in EF Core: set property based on Logic throws InvalidOperation Exception #30119
  • Error when setting column attributes #30118
  • every time use Add migration, ef wants to update all seeded data #30116

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.1 to 5.1.0 #30120
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
  • Support for DateOnly/TimeOnly for SQL Server #30109

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Enable the loc build for installer #15334
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 286: Build ID 2095247 #15333
  • Prebuilt report fix #15329

Merged

  • Enable dotnet-watch test and remove prep.sh workaround #15319
  • Add pipeline parameter for disabling the VMR build during PRs #15328

Updated

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add CI for building with N-1 source-built SDK #15164
